definition: Long March (retreat of the Red Army 1934-1935)
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack

sentences.english: Reducing the number of HTTP requests in your page is the place to start.
sentences.chinese: 減少頁面的HTTP請求數量只是萬里長征第一步。

sentences.english: It is one of the key technologies in the development of LM-3A launch vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 冷氦增壓是長征三號甲研製中的關鍵技術之一。

sentences.english: It just starts and there is still a long way to go.
sentences.chinese: 萬里長征剛剛開始，以後還有很長的路要走。

sentences.english: The basic spirit of revering the nature had formed.
sentences.chinese: 在龐大族羣的長征中，形成了敬畏自然的基本精神。

sentences.english: It is indeed the first step toward marching to a1,000-miledestination.
sentences.chinese: 這無疑是萬里長征的第一步。

sentences.english: This road is like a long ribbon reddened by the blood of numerous martyrs.
sentences.chinese: 長征這條紅飄帶，是無數紅軍的鮮血染成的。

sentences.english: This year is the 70th anniversary of the Red Army.
sentences.chinese: 今年是紅軍長征勝利70週年。

sentences.english: There was no more time left. He must quit.
sentences.chinese: 沒有更多的時間來考慮了，他必須退出長征。

sentences.english: This is a first step in a very long journey.
sentences.chinese: BP只是邁出了萬里長征的第一步。

sentences.english: I chatted with him enthusiastically march their future path.
sentences.chinese: 我與他興致勃勃地聊着他們未來的長征之路。

definition: Red Army (1928-1937), predecessor of the PLA/(Soviet) Red Army (1917-1946)
war of resistance, especially the war against Japan (1937-1945)
to collaborate/to join forces/to effect a junction
Jinggang Mountains, in the Jiangxi-Hunan border region
Jinggangshan county level city in Ji'an 吉安, Jiangxi
Nanchang Uprising, 1st August 1927, the beginning of military revolt by the Communists in the Chinese Civil War
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
